featured.text: This textbook is __________ more difficult to read than the other one.
At the Book Fair, exhibitors from 21 countries will _______ textbooks, novels, and comic books.

definition.zh_def: 教科書，通常用於學校或教育機構中，提供特定學科的知識和資料。
definition.en_def: A book used as a standard source of information on a particular subject, typically for educational purposes.
definition.example: I bought a new textbook for my biology class.
